statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Banana';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, reorder_point FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT AVG(quantity_in_stock) AS average_quantity_in_stock FROM products;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE product_name IN ('Apple', 'Banana');
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > (SELECT AVG(quantity_in_stock) FROM products);
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT product_name) AS unique_products FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Orange' AND quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock = reorder_point;
SELECT MAX(quantity_in_stock) AS max_quantity_in_stock FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > reorder_point ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' OR product_name LIKE '%banana%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point FROM products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 AND quantity_in_stock < 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity_in_stock) AS total_quantity FROM products GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock * 2 AS double_quantity FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point, CASE WHEN quantity_in_stock < reorder_point THEN 'Need to restock' ELSE 'In stock' END AS stock_status FROM products;
SELECT product_name, AVG(quantity_in_stock) AS avg_quantity FROM products GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, CASE WHEN quantity_in_stock < 10 THEN 'Low Stock' WHEN quantity_in_stock < 50 THEN 'Medium Stock' ELSE 'High Stock' END AS stock_category FROM products;
SELECT product_name, LEAST(quantity_in_stock, reorder_point) AS min_stock FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock * reorder_point AS reorder_amount FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point, CASE WHEN reorder_point > quantity_in_stock THEN 'Need to reorder' ELSE 'No need to reorder' END AS reorder_status FROM products;

SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point, (reorder_point - quantity_in_stock) AS reorder_quantity_gap FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_point ORDER BY reorder_quantity_gap DESC;

SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point, (reorder_point - quantity_in_stock) AS reorder_quantity_gap FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_point ORDER BY reorder_quantity_gap ASC;

SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point, CASE WHEN quantity_in_stock = reorder_point THEN 'At reorder point' WHEN quantity_in_stock < reorder_point THEN 'Below reorder point' ELSE 'Above reorder point' END AS reorder_status FROM products;

SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point, CASE WHEN quantity_in_stock <= 10 THEN 'Critical Stock' WHEN quantity_in_stock <= 50 THEN 'Low Stock' ELSE 'Normal Stock' END AS stock_level FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point, quantity_in_stock + reorder_point AS total_stock FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point, CEILING(quantity_in_stock / reorder_point) AS reorder_cycles FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock, reorder_point, FLOOR(quantity_in_stock / 10) AS stock_buckets FROM products ORDER BY stock_buckets ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM products WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock FROM products;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01' GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, order_date, quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT product_name, order_date, quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT product_name, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM products LEFT JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM products RIGHT JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM products INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM products FULL OUTER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM products LEFT JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE order_date IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM products RIGHT JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE product_name IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products WHERE current_stock < reorder_point;
SELECT product_name, MAX(current_stock) AS max_stock FROM products GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock FROM products GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products WHERE current_stock BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, current_stock, quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, quantity, order_date FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, order_date FROM products LEFT JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, order_date FROM products RIGHT JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, order_date FROM products INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, order_date FROM products LEFT JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE order_date IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, order_date FROM products RIGHT JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE current_stock < quantity;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products UNION SELECT product_name, quantity FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products INTERSECT SELECT product_name, quantity FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products EXCEPT SELECT product_name, quantity FROM orders;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products ORDER BY current_stock DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, location, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT location FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) FROM orders GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT products.name, orders.quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id;
SELECT products.name, orders.quantity FROM products LEFT JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id;
SELECT products.name, orders.quantity FROM products RIGHT JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id;
SELECT products.name, orders.quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.quantity > 5;
SELECT products.name, orders.quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id WHERE products.quantity < orders.quantity;
SELECT products.name, orders.quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id WHERE products.price * orders.quantity > 1000;
SELECT products.name, inventory.quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.id = inventory.product_id WHERE inventory.location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_id, location, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT orders.order_id, products.name, orders.quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT location, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count FROM inventory GROUP BY location;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.quantity, products.name, products.price FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id WHERE orders.quantity > 5;
SELECT orders.order_date, products.name, products.price FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id WHERE orders.order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse');
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT products.name, inventory.quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.id = inventory.product_id WHERE inventory.quantity > 50;
SELECT location, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(quantity) > 50;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.quantity, products.name, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.id WHERE orders.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT products.name, SUM(orders.quantity) AS total_orders FROM products JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id GROUP BY products.name;
SELECT products.name, orders.order_date, orders.quantity FROM products LEFT JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%shoes%';
SELECT location, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY location HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact_info FROM suppliers
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_quantity FROM orders
SELECT * FROM stockouts
SELECT stockout_id, product_id, stockout_date FROM stockouts
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_threshold
SELECT product_id, order_quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact_info FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 5
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%'
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact_info FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_contact_info LIKE '%email%'
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products LIMIT 5
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact_info FROM suppliers LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products
SELECT MAX(quantity_in_stock) FROM products
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact_info FROM suppliers
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_quantity FROM orders
SELECT product_id, stockout_date FROM stockouts
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_in_stock) AS total_stock FROM products
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS products_supplied FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT order_id, product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT stockouts.product_id, stockout_date, product_name FROM stockouts JOIN products ON stockouts.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_threshold
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_quantity > (SELECT AVG(order_quantity) FROM orders)
SELECT supplier_name, product_name FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.product_id
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name
SELECT supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < reorder_threshold)
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products JOIN stockouts ON products.product_id = stockouts.product_id
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_stockouts FROM suppliers JOIN stockouts ON suppliers.supplier_id = stockouts.product_id GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT order_id, order_quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM stockouts)
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, stock_level FROM Products WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, contact_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ReorderHistory WHERE quantity_ordered > 50;
SELECT history_id, product_id, reorder_date FROM ReorderHistory;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT order_id, status FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers;
SELECT * FROM ReorderHistory WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, stock_level, reorder_level FROM Products;
SELECT count(*) AS total_products FROM Products;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Products WHERE stock_level < reorder_level;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%-555-%';
SELECT * FROM ReorderHistory WHERE quantity_ordered > 100;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, reorder_level FROM Products WHERE stock_level < reorder_level AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM Orders WHERE status='Shipped');
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM ReorderHistory WHERE quantity_ordered > 200);
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30');
SELECT * FROM Products p JOIN Orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id;
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name FROM Orders o JOIN Products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.quantity >= 10;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, o.quantity FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN Products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status='Delivered';
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM Suppliers s JOIN ReorderHistory r ON s.supplier_id = r.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 1;
SELECT p.product_name, COUNT(r.history_id) AS total_reorders FROM Products p JOIN ReorderHistory r ON p.product_id = r.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name HAVING COUNT(r.history_id) >= 3;
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM Orders o JOIN Customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.status='Shipped' GROUP BY c.customer_name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, MAX(quantity_ordered) AS highest_quantity FROM Suppliers s JOIN ReorderHistory r ON s.supplier_id = r.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT p.product_name, AVG(reorder_level) AS average_reorder_level FROM Products p JOIN ReorderHistory r ON p.product_id = r.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(o.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE o.status='Delivered' GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT supplier_name, MIN(quantity_ordered) AS lowest_quantity FROM Suppliers s JOIN ReorderHistory r ON s.supplier_id = r.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
